/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a serene street scene in Beijing, China. The viewer's perspective is that of a pedestrian on the sidewalk, providing a ground-level view of the surroundings. The street is flanked by trees and power lines, adding a touch of urban charm to the scene. The sky above is a clear blue, suggesting a bright and sunny day. The image is taken from a low angle, which enhances the sense of depth and perspective. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the green of the trees contrasting beautifully with the blue sky.
